short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync grades input via the fast grader tool with Google Classroom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Fast Grade for Google Classroom at https://classfast.app is a tool for rapidly grading Google Classroom assignments, enabling teachers to provide more feedback, and work with greater efficiency.

This simple but powerful extension empowers you to sync the grades you have entered into the Fast Grader with Google Classroom.
